comments.body: I have been searching for an hour on how to add custom shape finally I got it thanks

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +55,59 @@                floatingActionButtonLocation: location,
                bottomNavigationBar: BottomAppBar(
                  shape: AutomaticNotchedShape(
                    BeveledRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(50.0)),
                    SuperellipseShape(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(30.0)),
